mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Raw_Materials_Warehouse WHERE Stock_no = #{Stock_no}
mapper.sql: Stock_no, Material_no, Stock_num, Storage_address, Product_date, Staff_no_storage, Details
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where flag=0
order by ${orderByClause}
select Stock_no from Raw_Materials_Warehouse order by Stock_no desc limit 1

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where to_days(Product_date) = to_days(now()) and flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse WHERE YEARWEEK(date_format(Product_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now()) and flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse WHERE DATE_FORMAT( Product_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' ) and flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where QUARTER(Product_date)=QUARTER(NOW()) and flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc

select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where YEAR(Product_date)=YEAR(NOW()) and flag=0 and Stock_no like '%${Stock_no}%' and Material_no like '%${Material_no}%' and Storage_address like '%${Storage_address}%' and Staff_no_storage like '%${Staff_no_storage}%' order by Product_date desc
select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where flag=0 order by Product_date desc
select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where Material_no = #{Material_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select * from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where Staff_no_storage = #{Staff_no_storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
select count(*) from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where flag=0

select
from Raw_Materials_Warehouse where Stock_no = #{Stock_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and flag=0
mapper.insert: insert into Raw_Materials_Warehouse (Stock_no, Material_no, Stock_num, Storage_address, Product_date, Staff_no_storage, Details) values (#{Stock_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Material_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Stock_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Storage_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Product_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Staff_no_storage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Details,jdbcType=BIGINT})
